title: Ep. 228: The Park Avenue Face with Dr. Andrew Jacono (Replay)
itunes:title: Ep. 228: The Park Avenue Face with Dr. Andrew Jacono (Replay)

description:
We’re taking a quick break before our new fall season begins next week. This episode features a new introduction and Raise A Wand segment, but the interview previously aired last year, as part of episode 157. It features plastic surgeon Dr. Andrew Jacono, who talks about new facelift techniques, preventative Botox, the perils of too much injectable filler, and how he can tell which celebrities have had "work” done. Enjoy! -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
